openwebui_variables.name: RAG_EMBEDDING_ENGINE
openwebui_variables.description: Selects an embedding engine to use for RAG.

openwebui_variables.name: RAG_EMBEDDING_MODEL
openwebui_variables.description: Sets a model for embeddings. Locally, a Sentence-Transformer model is used.

openwebui_variables.name: RAG_EMBEDDING_MODEL_AUTO_UPDATE
openwebui_variables.description: Toggles automatic update of the Sentence-Transformer model.

openwebui_variables.name: RAG_EMBEDDING_MODEL_TRUST_REMOTE_CODE
openwebui_variables.description: Determines whether to allow custom models defined on the Hub in their own modeling files.
